features: FLEXIBLE SHAPE FOR 6+ MONTH BABY : The nipple on these pacifiers for babies is 60% thinner and 4x more flexible than average, exerting less pressure on the mouth in order to avoid jaw deformations.
VENTILATED & COMFORTABLE SHIELD: These cute pacifiers for babies have a curved sterilizing shield with openings to keep baby comfortable, prevent moisture build-up, and allow baby’s skin to breathe.
SYMMETRICAL DESIGN: The breastfeed pacifier for babies is fun and functional. The curved shield with wide openings are always right-side up and prevent skin irritation with maximum airflow.
SELF - STERILIZING CASE: Add water and pop into the microwave to sterilize MAM silicone pacifiers 16+ months in just 3 minutes and store in case for at home and travel to protect the pacifiers.
HIGH QUALITY: Approved by 94% of babies*, our 100% BPA & BPS free orthodontic silicone pacifiers meet or exceed US safety standards and are extremely durable, while being soft and flexible.
body.description: Specially designed with your little one’s teeth and jaw in mind, the MAM Perfect Pacifier is clinically proven* to reduce the risk of open bite and increased overbite later in life. With a 60% thinner neck and 4 times more flexible nipple** than a regular pacifier, you can be assured that your little one’s favorite binky is safe for their development as it puts less pressure on their jaw and teeth. MAM’s medically engineered nipples feature life-like, SkinSoft textured silicone that feels more natural, just like mom. With multiple nipple and shield sizes to pick from, MAM nipples are easily accepted by babies of all ages, with 94% nipple acceptance among babies tested***. Babies simply love the ease and comfort of latching onto MAM nipples. Sterilize baby’s MAM pacifier in the microwave using the convenient MAM self-sterilizing storage case. Microwave disinfection is proven effective in killing common household germs and bacteria. Pacifiers kept in the closed box will remain disinfected for up to 48 hours: Fill pacifier case with water. Place pacifier in the pacifier case with the nipple facing down. Follow pacifier package instructions for microwave setting. Cool completely before use. *Y. Wagner, R. Heinrich-Weltzien, “Effect of a thinneck pacifier on primary dentition: a randomized controlled trial”, Orthodontics & Craniofacial Research, Volume 19, Issue 3, pages 127–136, August 2016. **Scientific reports from Wild Hi-Precision institute verify: the MAM Perfect’s teat neck is on average 60% thinner; test series by the University Clinic of Dentistry Vienna confirm: it is also on average 4 times more flexible than comparable pacifiers. (Between: 32% – 83% thinner / 1.1 – 19.5 times more flexible than regular silicone pacifiers). *** Market Research 2009-2017, tested with 1,508 babies.

productInformation.name: Care instructions
productInformation.value: ‎Inspect carefully before each use. Pull the pacifier in all directions. Throw away at the first signs of damage or weakness. Only use dedicated pacifier holders tested to EN 12586. Never attach other ribbons or cords to a pacifier, your child may be strangled by them. Do not leave a pacifier in direct sunlight or near a source of heat or leave in sterilizing solution for longer than recommended, as this may weaken the nipple.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Parenting is hard. We make stuff to make it easier. MAM knows that being a parent is not always easy, so we make products that are smart and simple to use. For over 45 years we've been obsessed with making innovative pacifiers, bottles, cups, teethers, and toothbrushes, providing babies with optimal care at all stages. Designs May Vary MAM Perfect Pacifier 2 Perfect Pacifiers with Sterilizing Case MAM's BPA/BPS-free MAM Perfect Pacifiers have been developed by pediatric dentists and developmental psychologists to provide maximum comfort and style for babies ages 6+ months*. MAM’s pacifiers combine technological innovation and trendsetting design to help give babies a healthy start in life. *Developed in conjunction with the International Children’s Medical Research Society Perfect nipple reduces the risk of misaligned teeth Anti-slip texture helps nipple stay comfortably in baby’s mouth Curved shield allows the pacifier to sit comfortably on baby’s face Shield openings allow air to circulate and baby’s skin to breathe

Air holes in shield allow baby's skin to breathe Extra thin and flexible nipple allows room for teeth to grow SkinSoft silicone nipple offers a familiar feel Self sterilizing case sterilizes in the microwave in just 3 minutes

MAM Perfect Pacifier MAM Perfect Night Pacifier MAM Air Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier MAM Original Pacifier & Clip 6+ Nipple Size ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ SkinSoft Textured Silicone Nipple ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Textured Shield (Reduces Skin Irritation) ✓ ✓ Extra Air Exposure (For Sensitive Skin) ✓ Extra Thin & Flexible Orthodontic Nipple ✓ ✓ Quantity 2 2 2 2 2 Pacifiers & 1 Clip Includes Self-Sterilizing Box ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Glows in the Dark ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mam is the best, bonus points for a more teeth friendly design
reviews.reviewText: These are the same quality found at local big box stores. Mam pacifiers have been a go to in my house for all 3 of my babies. I was intrigued to find this thinner, teeth friendly design for my 9 month old. There was a little bit of push back from the slight change of nipple shape, but with a little patience and persistence my little guys transitioned fine. The design makes sense for less teeth shifting, however time will tell. I would honestly buy the original mam pacifiers if these weren't available, but I am oh so glad that they offer a more conscious design like this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the only pacifiers my daughter will take. She rejected every other kind. I have purchased so many packs for we always have extras on hand. Great quality and she loves the thin nipple.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is the only brand that my babies use. I love how cute, lightweight and how the nipple is shaped so it doesn’t ruin their teeth.They also sell the glow in the dark and let me say- my kids doesn’t have a hard time looking for them when they lose it at night.Also the box that comes with it can be used to sanitize the pacifiers and it is very easy to clean! That’s a win y’all!I highly recommend this specially for first time mom or dad!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pacifiers like any other mam
reviews.reviewText: I was unsure about this product since it’s way thinner that the normal ones but my baby loves them. No complains here!I like that they fit better in her mouth I just wish they had the window to see her beautiful smile.Still great product and I recommend it!Also love that I can sanitize in the microwave since I’m traveling with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2019
reviews.reviewText: My son started with the MAM pacifiers for newborns, and then transitioned to these around 6 months when his teeth came in! He was hooked on the newborn ones, and now again with these. We have at least 4-6 around the house. Now he has 8 teeth, chews on them, throws them around and they hold up great. The flat part is great for babes with teeth! There is no other pacifier made as well as MAM, in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I really liked these pacifiers as a replacement for the newborn MAMs we had as "samples" but my husband does not. I think they are easy to clean (especially with the included case). My LO didn't seem to have any problems transitioning to these at all.I will say that due to the design sometimes LO's lips seem to press through the pacifier? I'm not sure how else to describe it -- because it's such a minimal design, when LO sucks on the nipple her lips squish past. Doesn't seem to bother her at all, but it does mess me up a little. I would buy these again though!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I can’t say enough good things about MAM and all of their products. We’ve used them since birth and love them! These pacifiers didn’t disappoint, very cute and colorful, baby loves them, easy to clean.
